works.complaint:
I have recently applied for a loan through this
company  
that actually says it'll provide you a loan of upto £15000, once you go  
through this process they say you have to pay a fee to process the  
acceptance, however!!... try contact the phone number after accepting this
 
offer with the cheque, the phone line will tell you to contact them
through  
the website or by email, no response after the accepted offer is ever
made,  
this has been made noticed by many forums, yet this company is still  
showing as a paid resualt in your adwords. I was lucky to cancel my cheque
 
to them and avoid wasted money for a falsely advertised company. I think  

you should investigate this further and maybe inform authorities as I
have.  
I wouldn't want any other person to fall victim of this style of fraud.
